website_summaries.verdict: A high-end outdoor daybed that is capable of supporting two lounging or four sitting.
pros: This model features two half-circle couches and an ottoman, which can be assembled into a daybed
The unit also includes a canopy that may be attached to the largest couch section
The neutral colors employed in the design allow the daybed to blend in with a wide variety of backyard décor
cons: This model is on the higher end of the price scale, and it may need to be treated with a fabric protector to help ensure maximum life

customer_reviews.title: Resort Daybed and Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: A great outdoor bed that makes all my friends jealous. The quality and value is very good, but the fabric for the cushions is thin, not waterproof, and stains easily. Make sure you get lots of Scotchguard to protect the fabric and a waterproof cover like this for the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: ScottSpellmanPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat this value. This set would sell for 3 or 4 times the amount locally. It is easy to put together, minimum assembly, and the packaging was easy to open. The material is easy to clean but I don't recommend the "white" unless it is a must for your color scheme. Also understand the material is not a cloth material it is a nylon material which does provide easy clean up but a little disappointing in regards to comfort and style. I would probably buy this again, in a darker color (sand).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend the light color
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend the light color . It's stains ! Not waterproof as stated . Maybe spend a little more and purchase a sunbrella fabric ?
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love it, and a the lowest price I could find.
customer_reviews.author: MazyCakes

customer_reviews.title: I previously posted how horrible the delivery service of Forward Air SF was but ...
customer_reviews.text: I previously posted how horrible the delivery service of Forward Air SF was but the furniture itself I give 5 stars and I am happy so far with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and doesn’t move around a lot when our together. Little bit more pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Corey W.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the patio furniture. Came on time and is perfect by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this product and professionalism of this company, highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: We love the set
customer_reviews.text: We love the set. So far they are very water proof with water wicking off with a simple towel. I would advise to store the cushions in a large enough space when not using so you don't bend or mis-shape them. The may not go back on with the clean lines as when they were new. But overall standing up to the North East rains and weather...
customer_reviews.author: joe bernard

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my daybed. Customer service was great as well :) Highly recommend this product and this company
customer_reviews.author: Kara Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable (zzzzzz). Can't say enough about the compliments we ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got it!. Very comfortable (zzzzzz). Can't say enough about the compliments we have gotten. A must have for lounging!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home La Mesa Cabana / Canopy Set, 4-Pcs Set, Brown
product_meta.description: The Bellagio 4Piece outdoor sectional daybed provides you with a shady & comfortable resting area for you & your family. Four separate sections allow for easy configuration to fit your needs. Great for your patio or pool area, The brown wicker with off-white fabric looks classy with any outdoor decor.
feature_bullets: Includes one couch with canopy, two half-circle couches, one round ottoman, and four throw pillows
Cabana with pillows allows for wonderful relaxation outdoors
Sofa: 89" L x 44.75" W x 27.25" H - sectional (each): 63.5" L x 32.75" W x 11.75" H - ottoman: 34.5" L x 34.5" H x 11.75" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars20 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
